name: Nyxian
subtitle: The Latest Nyxian Build
description: Here you will find the latest weekly build of Nyxian

apps.name: Nyxian
apps.localizedDescription: Nyxian is a iOS application for iOS 16.0 and above(iOS 26 latest beta tested) that empowers iOS users to code, compile, link, sign and even execute/rapid test iOS applications directly on their device! It is the successor of the former FridaCodeManager project, which was deprecated in favor of Nyxian, because FridaCodeManager requires a jailbreak to work while Nyxian does not.

versions.localizedDescription:
### CAUTION
Only use this build on iPad, the iPhone version of the window server v3 is not done yet.
Utility development is also broken currently.
Expect the more stable builds to come in the next 3 days.

### Changelog
- Introducing a very early version of window server v3 (Introducing much easier navigation).
- Bringing back the bring window associated with project to front feature.
- Adding a brand new entitlement enforcement system, with more fine grain control over what process can and cannot do.
- Process spawning is now synchronized with the ksurface process table to reduce further attack surface.

### Caution
iPad Only Build again

This build is mostly improvements. Improvements mandatory to push further.

### Changelog
- Rewrote window gestures to be intuitive
- Improved window design.
- Animated windows.
- Fixed Utility development
- Fixed Process tree recursive killing
- Fixed vulnerability in seqlock
- Fixed vulnerability in PEEntitlementSpawnSignedOnly handling
- Fixed up ServerSession code.
